jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: In this role, you will be responsible for the application design and development of application components or multiple application solutions to meet business and customer requirements.
responsibility: Develop accurate and efficient programs
Maintain current knowledge of standard language, coding methods, and operations requirements
Thoroughly tests the operation of completed programs and linkage to other programs
Assists the system analyst to establish file requirements and processing specifications for automated portions of the system
Build software and deploy to UIS/SIT/UAT environment
Support defect/problem investigation
qualification: Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, IT or other related fields (fresh grads welcome!)
At least 3 years of experience in JAVA software development or other programming languages (Java, GO, JavaScript, Kotlin, Swift, Node.js, C#, Python)

Experience working with one or more from the following: web application development, Unix environments, mobile application development, information retrieval, networking, developing large-scale software system, version control system, and/or security software development
Knowledge of XML, Restful, JSON, Framework, SQLite and OOP Concept
Knowledge of SVN,GIT
skill: Programming Languages  (Java, GO, JavaScript, Kotlin, Swift, Node.js, C#, Python)​

jobs.title: Test Manager/Test Engineer
jobs.description: In this role, you will be the key person to drive software quality through test management strategy to ensure that software delivered with quality and zero incident. If you are experienced in software development, software testing, test management, agile testing, test automation, testing technology and tools, this is the role for you.
responsibility: Design test strategy and test approach to ensure the software quality in all aspect cover functional and non-functional
Design test scenario, test environment, test data and test coverage based on business requirement and system impact

Conduct and manage testing dependency across multiple applications and complex environment, help the team find ways that software can break and come up with recommendation to prevent those from happening
Research and develop new testing technology that can be adopted by other teams
qualification: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, IT or related field (fresh grads welcome!)
0-5 years of experience in Software Application Testing
Good knowledge of Software Testing Methodology and Processes
Good knowledge on using SQL and Scripting

Bonus point if you have at least one of the following: knowledge of banking business / accounting / solution design, experience in automated testing / programming / agile / cross-functional team environment
Communication and presentation skills
Teamwork, high responsibility and result oriented, strong analytical thinking, conceptual thinking and problem-solving
skill: Automation Skill

jobs.title: System Engineer - Server Management
jobs.description: In this role, you will be involved in the planning and development of the database with the fit recommendation and technology, as well as in troubleshooting any issues.
responsibility: Handle installation, upgrades, migrations and configuration database
Design and build databases, schemas, stored procedures, and other database objects
Design backup recovery strategy based on application requirements like schedule, retention etc.
Maintains database security and integrity follow policy and governance
Set up routine database backup procedures and disaster recovery procedures
Perform database performance tuning and capacity planning
Setup monitoring and alerting on database performance, system metrics, trends
Maintain, and manage the database system in accordance with the Service Level Agreement (SLA)
Support day-to-day operation, incident and chang
Assist developers and end-users with database usage, query development, and tuning
Provide help to junior DBA with complex database tasks
Competent to work at the highest level of all phases of database administration
Advance database administration – replication, migration, data distribution, etc.
qualification: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineer, Computer Science or related field (fresh grads welcome!)
3-5 years of experience in database administration and related DB Software tools management
Extensive knowledge of Oracle RDBMS, RAC and Data Guard
Knowledge of MySQL, MariaDB and PostgreSQL are a plus
Experience in Database design and performance tuning
On-call / On-site requirements to ensure 24 x 7 support of database operations
UNIX and Windows batch scripting knowledge is mandatory
skill: DBA and Unix

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: In this role, you will enjoy working with rich data sets, cutting-edge technology, and the ability to see your insights turned into real impact on customers and society as part of our Machine Learning and Data Science team.
responsibility: Work in a cross-functional team to define problems, quantify metrics, explore data, build analytical models, conduct experimentation, and make recommendations
Build and maintain optimization models, visualizations, experiments, forecasting algorithms, and machine learning models
Leverage various tools in data processing and modeling to drive efficient advanced analytics
Work with business partners to understand processes and leverage data to gain actionable insights
Use predictive modeling to enhance and optimize customer experiences, revenue generation, and business operation
Communicate findings and recommendations to all stakeholders as well as drive decision making
Explore state-of-the-art data science and machine learning research
Be part of an active group of data science and machine learning practitioners that shape the direction of machine learning and artificial intelligence of the organization
qualification: Bachelor's Degree or higher in quantitative field e.g. Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Operations Research or other related field
Good communication with strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Experience with Machine Learning, Statistics, or other data analysis tools and techniques
Experience in extraction, cleaning, analysis, and presentation for medium to large datasets
Experience with at least one programming language (e.g., Python, R, Scala)
Experience writing efficient SQL queries

Experience with tools for data visualization (Matplotlib, Tableau, or Qlik), scientific computing (e.g., NumPy, SciPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, dplyr, or ggplot2) and machine learning (e.g., PyTorch, Caffe2, TensorFlow, Keras or Theano).
Experience with statistics methods such as forecasting, time series, hypothesis testing, classification, clustering or regression analysis
Experience working with distributed computing tools (Hadoop, Hive, Spark, etc.) and Cloud platform (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) considered a plus

Experience with one or more advanced machine learning topics (e.g., deep learning, recommendation systems, knowledge representation, semi-supervised learning, reinforcement learning, representation learning, privacy-preserving learning, adversarial learning) is a plus
skill: Statistics Methods and Computer Tools

jobs.title: IT Operation - System Operator
jobs.description: In this role, you will utilize your passion for computer operations/systems, strong problem solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot computer problems to resolve any malfunctions in IT operation.
responsibility: Investigate and understand root cause for issues in IT Operation
Provide consulting service and develop corrective actions to solve the operation issues
Ensure operation related activities are performed in compliance with standard and regulations
Initiate continuous process to improve operational effectiveness
Provide technical support and guidance on operations validation, development and implementation
Provide engineering support operations team in archiving business goals
Support the start-up and integration of new operation projects
Assist in the development and maintenance of operation standards and procedures
qualification: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineer, ICT or related field (fresh grad welcome!)
Demonstrate a thorough knowledge of computer functions and strong computer operation skills
Capable of working efficiently with minimal supervision
Possess strong communication skills and be able to follow directions
Exemplify analytical and problem solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot computer problems that may arise
Superior time management skills are essential in order to ensure work orders are completed on time
Must work in shifts
Should have a positive attitude and work well with others

Any of the following skills is a plus: Batch, Job control, job scheduling, job scheduler, Control-M, Tivoli Workload scheduler, JAMS scheduler, Himemos, Global ECS, Autosys, CA workload automation AE, BatchMan, ActiveBatch, Oracle Grid Engine, Schedulix, VisualCron, Quartz Enterprise Job Scheduler, NOC, Monitoring, Truesight, zabbix, datadog, SolarWinds, Spiceworks Network Monitor, PRTG, OpenNMS, Netreo, NetData, Microsoft System Center, PRTG, VeeamONE, CloudMonitor, Bladelogic, Grafana, AIOps, Backup and Recovery, Automation, RPA, Kyron, SRE.
skill: Computer Functions and Computer Operation

jobs.title: Data Engineer
jobs.description: In this role, you will express your passion about data and insights of large data set as you work closely with Data Scientist, Machine Engineer, Business Analysts and other stakeholders across the company.
responsibility: Conduct meeting with users to understand data requirements and perform database design based on data understanding and requirements with consideration for performance
Maintain data dictionary, relationship and its interpretation
Analyze problem and find resolution, as well as work closely with administrators to monitor performance and advise any necessary infrastructure changes
Work with business domain experts, data scientists and application developers to identify relevant data for analysis.
Develop big data solutions for batch processing and near real-time streaming

Own end-to-end data ETL/ELT process framework of Data Lake from Data Source to Data Mart and Data Exchange with peripheral systems, with process alignment to KBANK policies and implement ETL/ELT Process
Select and integrate appropriate tools and frameworks required to provide requested capabilities
Design and develop BI solutions
Keep abreast of new developments in the big data ecosystem and learn new technologies
qualification: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Engineer, Computer Science, Information Technology, Mathematics, Statistics or related fields

2-5 years of experience in database design, data integration, data pipeline development, big data, or business intelligence applications in a competitive service industry preferably in banking, financial services, or telecom
Working knowledge of DB2, Hadoop, Data Virtualization, Qlikview/Qliksense is a plus
Good oral and written communication in Thai and English languages
Hands-on development mentality, with a willingness to troubleshoot and solve complex problems.
Ability to effectively work independently and handle multiple priorities
skill: Skill in Big Data, ETL/ELT, Hadoop, etc.

jobs.title: Business Analyst
jobs.description: In this role, you will be the liaison between the business users and technical team to ensure the proper solutions is developed and delivered according to the business needs.
responsibility: Assist in business conceptualization and rationalization (feasibility, cost/benefit, fit/gap analysis)
Develop plan and approach for requirement analysis and design phase
Understand, analyze, prioritize and confirm end-to-end business requirements and processes
Provide options and recommend end-to-end business solution or workaround
Design and confirm functional specification including application flow, business logics, screens, reports and data files, etc.
Perform impact analysis, consolidate implementation efforts and develop implementation plan from the input of various parties e.g. development team, test team, and infrastructure team
Perform functional testing, when assigned
Manage requirements throughout the life cycle
Manage functional issue(s) and risk(s)
Develop plan and approach for business deployment including training
Develop training materials and conduct the training
Supervise and coach subordinate(s)
qualification: 1-4 years of experience as Business Analyst or System Analyst (fresh grads welcome!)
Background in banking and financial services business is a plus
Strong analytical and proven ability to quickly understand complex business and systems and provide appropriate solution
Excellent interpersonal and communication skills and ability to effectively collaborate with diverse people such as clients, developers, or testers
Driver, committed, result-oriented
Ability to work under pressure and tight deadlines
skill: Business Knowledge of Banking and Finance and Technical Knowledge to Certain Extent

jobs.title: Cloud Engineer
jobs.description: In this role, you will be responsible for deploying and debugging cloud stacks, educating teams on new cloud initiatives, and ensuring the security of the cloud infrastructure.
responsibility: Collaborate with engineering and development teams to evaluate and identify optimal cloud solutions
Modify and improve existing systems
Educate teams on the implementation of new cloud technologies and initiatives
Design, develop, and deploy modular cloud-based systems
Develop and maintain cloud solutions in accordance with best practices
Ensure efficient functioning of data storage and processing functions in accordance with company security policies and best practices in cloud security
Identify, analyze, and resolve infrastructure vulnerabilities and application deployment issues
Review existing systems and making recommendations for improvements
Interact with clients, provide cloud support, and make recommendations based on client needs
qualification: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, IT or related field (fresh grads welcome!)
At least 3 years of experience in the field of cloud computing
Experience with CI/CD systems
Experience with SysOps
Azure, AWS, GCP and Huawei Cloud certifications is a plus
Troubleshooting and analytical skills
Good communication and collaboration skills
Client management skills

jobs.title: Agile Coach
jobs.description: In this role, you will be a change agent to drive change-welcoming culture and empower team to deliver excellent software under the agility of Banking Industry environment.
responsibility: Work closely with development teams to build Agile mindset and coach the relevant practices
Establish technical excellence & agility culture
Create continuous improvement culture and close the feedback loop back to management
qualification: 4-5 years of experience working in Software Development in any role

Strong experience in Agile concepts, practices and techniques
Good knowledge of several Agile Framework and related methodology such as Scrum, LeSS, SAFe, XP, Kanban, etc.
Good understanding of software engineering architecture and practices such DevOps, CI/CD, TDD, ATDD, Pair Programming, etc.
Strong Interpersonal skills and coaching skills
skill: Agile or Software Development

jobs.title: Machine Learning Engineer​
jobs.description: In this role, you and data scientists will be helping other teams apply data science, machine learning, artificial intelligence tools and techniques to financial products and services. Work with rich data sets, cutting-edge technology, and watch your insights turn into real impact on customers and society.
responsibility: Design, code, train, test, deploy, and iterate on large-scale, distribute machine learning systems
Collaborate with a multi-functional agile team of data science, UX/UI design, product management, and engineering to build new features / products / services that delight our customers
Work with data scientists and data engineers to create end-to-end machine learning feedback loop and integrate it into various applications
Improve existing machine learning models both in terms of model performance and computing performance
Help drive code review, optimization, testing, and tooling to improve code quality and system reliability
Research and implement best practices to enhance existing machine learning infrastructure and process
Be part of an active group of data science and machine learning practitioners that shape the direction of machine learning and artificial intelligence of the organization
qualification: Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related technical fields involving Machine Learning or equivalent technical experience
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Proven software development skills in multiple programming languages (e.g. Python, Golang, C++)
Experience with machine learning software packages (e.g. scikit-learn, XGBoost, TensorFlow, Caffe, Theano, Torch)
Familiarity with container-based technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) and DevOps practices (e.g., code review, automated testing, CI/CD, logging, performance monitoring)
Strong communication skills and collaborative mindset
Experience with data processing tools (e.g. Hadoop, Apache Spark, Apache Beam) and cloud platforms (e.g. AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus

jobs.title: IT Infrastructure Project Manager
jobs.description: In this role, you will be responsible for the continued availability and support of all infrastructure projects as a part of our infrastructure team. The role will be expected to work in a fast pace.
responsibility: Identify infrastructure goals and project delivery clearly
Coordinate and get requirement into plan to cumulate in client acceptance of results of production deployment
Collaborate effectively with infrastructure associates across entire business units along with management levels
Define all activities necessary to acquire project goals and objectives within infrastructure department
Identify problem impact or disagreement plus recommend corrections as necessary
Provide day-to-day direction to the project teams
Develop and maintain project plan
qualification: At least 5 years of experience in an Infrastructure Project Manager role
Ability to run multiple projects while maintaining quality and control
Ability to lead and provide guidance to infrastructure engineers drawing on their project and technical experience
Be highly collaborative with the current team, management structure and business leaders
Demonstrate a very high level of customer service and empathy to the customer issues delivering solutions while working within budget
Negotiate with suppliers to provide best balance of quality, service and price
Good communication skill
Background in banking and financial services business is an advantage
skill: Infrastructure and Project Management

jobs.title: IT Security Architect
jobs.description: In this role, you will define bank's cybersecurity strategy, enterprise security architecture and roadmap, including developing relevant security requirements and standards for Information Technology.
responsibility: Define the Bank's cybersecurity strategy and roadmap
Define an Enterprise Security Architecture for the Bank and develop relevant IT Security requirements or IT Security standards for Information Technology
Define security framework for various new technologies such as Cloud, Biometric Technology, etc.

Provide advice on information security for projects and conduct security risk assessment to identify where the system could not comply with Bank’s information security policy or requirements, including tracking of exceptions.
Conduct security risk assessment for information systems which provided by external service providers (outsourcer) or system that being connected to an external service provider (third-party)
Review the information security controls for applications before the system is implemented to production
Study, select and implement the necessary information security system for the Bank
Implement DevSecOps technology to increase the security in software development life cycle (SDLC)
Develop and maintain security standards of various information technologies that the Bank uses
Conduct security testing for critical systems or new technologies where required
qualification: Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Security
At least 3 years of work experience in a relevant discipline
Comprehensive understanding of the IT security concepts, especially enterprise security architecture area, risk assessment and related information security standards such as ISO 27001, PCI DSS, etc.
Ability to analyze end-to-end security process, assess IT security risks of information systems, and provide advice in order to reduce risk to the bank acceptable level
Ability to study and implement essential IT security standards and controls to enhance the bank's security
Strong analytical and problem solving capabilities
Excellent teamwork and interpersonal skills
Rapid learning capability and able to work under pressure
Good oral and written communication skills in both Thai and English
skill: IT Security Architect, Advisory and Engineering Skills
Certified Security Professional e.g. CISSP, CSSLP, CISA, CISM, CompTIA Security+, ISO 27001 Lead Auditor/Implementer

jobs.title: IT Security Architect (DevSecOps)
jobs.description: In this role, you will help manage and reduce security risks by developing global security controls to integrate into our DevOps pipelines. You will be establishing current and long-term direction aiming at driving DevSecOps culture in organization.
responsibility: Drive and develop a DevSecOps culture in organization
Research and establish DevSecOps implementation process and roadmap
Work with related team to implement, maintain and improve DevSecOps platform technology and practices
Develop secure software development process and guidelines
Assist application team to engage DevSecOps tools into their development pipelines
Establish and review DevSecOps governance, operating model and dashboards to ensure application adoption into their development pipelines
Perform security code and design reviews, risk assessment and provide recommendation to fix or mitigate the risk
Work with application team to resolve security issues from DevSecOps tools
Establish and review security configuration standard for related DevOps infrastructure
qualification: Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Security
At least 3 years of work experience in a relevant discipline
Comprehensive understanding of the application security concepts, especially DevSecOps, CI/CD, secure programming, and risk assessment
Strong working knowledge of OWASP Top10, CVE, CVSS, CWE, etc.
Hands-on experience implementing CI/CD pipeline and DevOps development practices and tools such as Jenkins, JFrog Artifactory, Grafana, and etc.
Experience in establishing secure software development guidelines and in performing security code and design reviews
Experience with a broad range of application security tools including SAST, DAST, SCA, etc.
Experience with cloud environments (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure)
Experience with container technology such as Docker, Kubernetes, Openshift, etc.
Programming/scripting experience (Powershell, Java, .NET, Python)
Strong analytical and problem solving capabilities
Excellent teamwork and interpersonal skills
Rapid learning capability and ability to work under pressure
Good oral and written communication skills in both Thai and English
skill: Secure Programming, DevOps and DevSecOps Skills

jobs.title: IT & Security Assurance
jobs.description: In this role, you will oversee all information security policy and procedures to ensure that they follow the bank's standard. Your work will also include developing and maintaining security management and compliance dashboard to detect and track all non-compliance issues.
responsibility: Develop and enhance information security policy, procedures and processes
Provide security awareness session to enhance understanding level of security policy and requirements
Perform project tracking and report(track issues related to IT operation and security until closed or at risk acceptable level)
Performing project management related to ISO27001 & PCI DSS compliance
Monitor and work with IT infrastructure and software development teams to close the deviations and non-compliance issues
Handle day-to-day governance issues related to IT and cybersecurity concerns to ensure compliance of security policy, standard, and procedure
Develop and maintain security management and compliance dashboard
Carry out any other special assignment and administrative works as required in order to support departmental activities and management’s assignment
qualification: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Information Technology, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Security
3-5 years of experience in a relevant discipline
Knowledge in IT & security governance/audit
Good analytical and problem solving skills
Good project management skill
Ability to work under pressure and time constraint
Good oral and written communication in Thai and English languages
Certified security professional such as CISA, CISM, ISO 27001 Lead Auditor/Implementer are a plus
skill: IT & Security Governance / Audit

jobs.title: Enterprise Architect
jobs.description: In this role, you will demonstrate your knowledge of technology and enterprise architecture to design architectures and strategic roadmaps, lead clients as a subject matter expert, and partner with them as a trusted advisor in their future digital experience and strategy execution
responsibility: Plan, design, develop and execute the effective EA to strengthen the business of KBank
Design and create the future enterprise architecture for banking business
Analyze and become an expert on banking reference architectures to suggest new and emerging technologies to our clients
Advise and analyse the root cause of complex enterprise architect
Perform other duties as assigned
qualification: Bachelor's Degree or higher in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, IT Management, MIS, etc.
1-2 years of experience in Architecture Design
3-6 years of experience in IT or Banking Industry

jobs.title: Project Management Officer
jobs.description: In this role, you will assist Project Manager or Delivery Manager to oversee projects and/or team status and drive for excellent outcome.
responsibility: Consolidate project and/or team progress, develop status report and conduct status update, including issue log and risk log
Change Request Management: manage all CRs and SRs, track and follow-up for progress, and conduct status update
Defect and Problem Management: manage all production defects and problem tickets, track and follow-up for progress, and conduct status update
Change and Release Management: plan and confirm for change deployment & release, act as change requester for change item
Team Management: arrange and conduct weekly team update, track team activity log, conduct the review of resource capacity plan and actual timesheet
Arrange and facilitate meetings
Develop minutes of meetings
qualification: 2-9 years of experience in PMO or more than 2 years in project manager
Familiar with Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
Strong interpersonal and communication skills and ability to effectively collaborate with diverse people such as developers, tester, or change implementer
Positive attitude, energetic, and able to work under pressure and tight deadlines
Background in banking and financial services business is a plus
Experiences in Defect Management, Problem Management, and Change Management a plus

jobs.description: In this role, you will lead a team on small project or segment of a larger project to deliver solutions to a client within project charter, project agreement or contract as well as corporate guidelines and legal requirements.
responsibility: Develop project plan and work break-down Structure (WBS)
Estimate required schedule, time, cost and resources

qualification: Bachelor's Degree in IT related field or industrial engineer
7-10 years of experience in IT related field, leading team and in IT project management
Professional Knowledge of market segment/industry/technology/project management methodology, technical management
Understanding of regulatory compliance
Professional knowledge related to incumbent's function/business unit and its process

responsibility: Define and recommend guidelines about software development best practices

Provide consultation and support complex, organization-wide issues in software development

Lead, coordinate and communicate with engineer teams to drive best practice and recommend improvement
Strive for continuous improvement in software engineering excellence
qualification: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field
4-10 years of relevant experience in position
Expertise and experience in designing tools and practices that help improve developer productivity
In-depth knowledge of programming languages on both frontend and backend, DevSecOps, Microservice, SQL/NoSQL, Containers
Strong conceptual and analytical skills - demonstrating outside-the-box problem solving skills
Strong communication and interpersonal and leadership skill
skill: Analytical Skill, Programming Languages (Frontend, Backend) DevSecOps, Microservice, SQL/NoSQL, Containers

jobs.title: DeFi / Blockchain Venture Architect

responsibility: Identify new business opportunities, strategy, business case analysis using various methods such as market research, design sprint, etc.

Strong background in venture creation, business strategy, quantitative modeling, disruptive technologies, and product developments
Ability to work in high-pressure, fast-paced startup environments with exposure to multidisciplinary teams
Focus on real user pain points and willing to forgo own ideas for greater goods and willingness to get your hands dirty
Great ability to communicate and be with people
A degree in Financial Engineering, Finance, or Mathematics

Understand KBTG products thoroughly, able to simplify and communicate with related stakeholders through all KBTG channels

jobs.title: Cyber Security - Vulnerability and Threat Intelligence
jobs.description: In this role, you will identify threats, vulnerabilities and their associated security risks within KBank by performing vulnerability testing and penetration testing across the CSOC constituency and provide advice on how to remediate the vulnerabilities discovered.
responsibility: Perform security vulnerability assessment and penetration testing of internal, perimeter, external and wireless network and web and mobile applications
Identify security weaknesses and vulnerabilities, and non-compliance within the CSOC constituency
Characterize threats and provide recommendation for remediation
Research and develop testing tools, technique and process
Perform vulnerability assessment and penetration testing as business as usual (BAU) tasks
Produce timely, accurate, relevant and predictive intelligence by identifying and reporting on malicious actors, campaigns, and other relevant activities
Monitor open source information feeds and threat actor activity to identify activity levels and indicators for threats, targets of interest and possible attack vectors
Work with the other CSOC team to ensure that actionable indicators of compromise are incorporated into appropriate technologies
Advise appropriate business units on technical configuration and process changes, remediation and best practices to adapt to changing threat, vulnerabilities and new attack methods
qualification: Bachelor’s Degree in a related field such as information security, management or computer engineering

5 years of relevant experience working in the Information Security field, including any of the following: threat intelligence, security operations, incident response, malware analysis, and/or vulnerability management
Experience with open source and Dark Web intelligence analysis tools
Prior experience in the Financial Services Industry is a plus
Experience operating all areas of the intelligence lifecycle
Experience in collecting intelligence from various information sources including but not limited to; malware analysis, open source/paid feeds and technical reports
Possess experience in tracking evolving threats and providing threat intelligence support to incident response teams
Excellent problem solving/analytical thinking skills
Demonstrable oral and written communication skills
Ability to create and provide executive level presentations
Experience in collaborating as part of a larger security/intelligence team
skill: Security Vulnerability Assessment and Penetration Testing

jobs.title: Cyber Security - IT & Security Operation
jobs.description: In this role, you will be in the center of the organization employing people, processes, and technology to continuously monitor and improve the security posture while preventing, detecting, analyzing, and responding to cybersecurity incidents. That includes Access Management of Privileged Identity and Cryptography.
responsibility: Manage the CSOC team to maintain and deliver appropriate services
Oversee the delivery of all CSOC services in the service portfolio such as Real Time Security Monitoring, Threat Intelligence and Research, and Security Incident Response and Investigation activities
Develop and support the implementation plans of new projects within the CSOC.
Develop CSOC service metrics; implement and monitor controls to ensure appropriate service levels are maintained
Provide thought leadership and attends industry events.
Maintain and administer personnel activities for direct reports, including recruitment, assignments, training, performance evaluations, and reviews
Maintain knowledge of relevant regulations, compliance requirements and policies that may have direct or indirect impact upon the CSOC and its services
qualification: Bachelor’s Degree in a related field such as Information Security, Management or Computer Engineering
Active CISSP & CISM certifications are required
At least 10 years of experience in Information Security Operations, with minimum of 5 years in leadership role
Service provider and government experience
Extensive experience with the management of security analytics, threat intelligence, security case management and other information security platforms
Extensive experience with the management of international, multi-cultural and multi-lingual teams
Working experience in a Security Operations Centre (SOC), Managed Security Service (MSS), or enterprise network environment
Excellent oral and written communication skills
Excellent organizational and time management skills
skill: Management of Security Analytics, Threat Intelligence and Platform

jobs.title: Cyber Security - Security Analysts and Incident Responder
jobs.description: In this role, you will be responsible for the validation and analysis of investigations passed up from tier 1 analysts. Tier 2 incident responder and investigator will complete the documentation of the investigation, determine the validity and priority of the activity and escalate to the Incident Manager and activate the Incident Response Plan (IR Plan) if appropriate.
responsibility: Recognize successful intrusions and compromises through review and analysis of relevant event detail information
Investigate potential security incidents, recognize attacks based on techniques, tactics and procedures and differentiates false positives from true intrusion attempts
Follow up and track investigations to resolution
Validate, classify incidents and update security incident cases
Alert system and information owners of intrusions and potential intrusions and compromises to their network infrastructure
Escalate security incidents to appropriate teams within KBank
Provide assistance during remediation of security incidents
Security services management including fine tuning security use cases
Improve the CSOC services continuously
Maintain and provide data required to calculate the CSOC services’ SLAs, KPIs and KRIs
Update CSOC processes and procedures as necessary
Follow and implement the KBank’s change management process
qualification: Bachelor’s Degree in Science or Engineering
At least 5 years of full-time experience in information security
Expert level analytical and problem-solving skills
Self-motivated with the ability to take decisions in the absence of detailed instructions
Expert level knowledge in managing and operating SIEM solutions, preferably using Splunk, is required
Proven experience in investigating security incidents
Proven experience in threat hunting
Ability to work with regular expression
Proven experience in programming with shell scripting and Python
Proven experience with Microsoft Windows and Linux operating systems
Proven experience with managing and monitoring network security devices such as firewalls and intrusion detection systems
Deep knowledge in network protocols such as TCP/IP, Syslog, DNS and NetFlow
Knowledge and/or experience with vulnerability assessment tool is preferred
Knowledge and/or experience in managing and monitoring distributed denial of services solutions
Knowledge of web technologies such as HTML, JavaScript and PHP is preferred
Proven experience with Microsoft Windows and Linux operating systems
Excellent oral and written communication skills, especially in conducting presentations, discussing security incidents and creating security incident reports
Working experience in a Security Operations Centre (SOC), Managed Security Service (MSS), or enterprise network environment
skill: Security Incidents Services Management

jobs.title: Cyber Security - Security Incident Management
jobs.description: In this role, you will monitor and track remediation work from the beginning to the end to ensures that security incidents are successfully closed and that escalation can be triggered when required.
responsibility: Coordinate with other departments and team to ensure remediation work is carried out because of incident detected
Monitor and track remediation work by the respective team, manage the affected systems from the beginning of the incident to closure
Generate and publish remediation progress reports on a regular basis
Escalate the case should remediation progress be reported
qualification: Bachelor's Degree in a related field such as Information Technology, Security Management or Computer Engineering
At least 5 years of related experience with a background in IT Operations, including support of applications and services
Experience working in a Security Operations Centre (SOC), Managed Security Service (MSS), or enterprise network environment is preferred
Experience and knowledge of the incident management principles and methodologies
Strong project management skills, including the ability to own and manage multiple incidents simultaneously
Ability to effectively influence others to change their perspectives, plans and/or behaviors
Excellent oral and written communication skills.
Excellent organizational and time management skills.
skill: Security Management (Security Operations Centre (SOC), Managed Security Service (MSS), or Enterprise Network Environment)

jobs.title: Cyber Security - Security Platform Management
jobs.description: In this role, you will be a key person for the overall CSOC architecture design and integration between the various platforms and components. You will be testing and building new, or updating existing, automation within CSOC technologies and integration between such technologies, including the larger set of systems and applications within KBank.
responsibility: Identify, evaluate, design new systems and technologies and provide security engineering guidance and recommendations
Work with the Threat Intelligence team to develop the technical design of the use case to be implemented in the SIEM
Develop reporting dashboards and track key performance indicators
Collaborate with the security monitoring team to improve the performance of the CSOC operations and assist in incident response and remediation efforts
Evaluate and select appropriate technology solutions to meet SOC consumer needs
Work with other SOC services to design automation and integration that meets their needs
Work with the CSOC Architect to test and fine tune the technical design of the use case to be implemented in the SIEM
Document SOC technology platform architecture and deployments
Perform day-to-day CSOC log management platform administration tasks including configuration management, patch management, updates and testing, fine tuning, etc.
Create searches, reports, dashboards and visualization
Manage all security and other data collected and stored by the CSOC
Implement, configure and onboard new data source
qualification: Bachelor's Degree in a related field such as Information Security, Management or Computer Engineering
Platform-specific certifications is preferred

Extensive experience with the design, development, implementation and management of security analytics, threat intelligence, security use case management and other CSOC and information security platforms
Working knowledge and expertise in various security technology and product e.g. Splunk, ThreatQ, ThreatGrid and Cybercops
At least 10 years of relevant experience in Cyber Security, Security Architecture, with minimum of four years in the design and implementation of a SIEM
Experience working in a Security Operations Centre (SOC), Managed Security Service (MSS), or enterprise network environment
Excellent written and oral communication skills
Excellent organizational and time management skills
skill: CSOC and Information Security Platforms

jobs.title: UX/UI Designer
jobs.description: In this role, you will use ‘design’ to drive innovative products and services to global standards. You will do this by engaging in challenging interdisciplinary work with multiple cross-functional teams.
responsibility: Actively take part in our growing and interdisciplinary design team, where you will help shape the future of our processes and culture
Indulge yourself in the study of the user
Creatively translate user values into products or services into captivating user experiences
Identify, understand, and foresee design issues or opportunities in product and service development
Utilize and adapt design process to approach ambiguous challenges
Constantly bring conversations about users and other stakeholders to the table throughout the product development cycle, from user research, to analysis, concepts, UX/UI design, launch, and iteration
Engage in deep collaboration with multidisciplinary professionals in fields of design, business, strategy, growth, software development, and technological innovation
qualification: A Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in any field is welcomed
A sensitivity to both the functional and the emotional aspects of design
A curious and open-mind: you see both the big picture as well the small details, and you enjoy connecting the dots and finding relationships within complexities
An ability to understand the intrinsic “why” behind each given task
Big plus if you have experience integrating quantitative processes into your overall qualitative research

It is not necessary for candidates to come from a pure design background, we are excited about any secondary experiences or interests you may have! A diversity of minds is what we look for as we’re growing our team
And don’t worry, you do not need to be able to do all this right now! We look forward to helping you grow your capabilities along with our growing team
skill: Human-Centered Thinking and a Familiarity With UX/UI or Service Design Processes and Tools (Figma, Zeplin, Adobe Suite, etc.)

responsibility: Develop and enhance policy, procedures and processes related to IT management and security
Provide IT and security awareness session to enhance understanding regarding level of policies and requirements
Perform project tracking and report (tracking issues related to IT operation and security until closing or risk acceptable level)
Perform project management related to ISO27001 & PCI DSS compliance
Monitor and work with IT infrastructure and software development teams to close the deviations and non-compliance issues
Handle day-to-day governance issues related to all IT operation and software quality and cyber security concerns to ensure compliance of IT & security policy, standard, and procedure
Develop and maintain security management / compliance dashboard to ensure all non-compliance issues are followed and tracked
Carry out any other special assignment and administrative works as required in order to support departmental activities / management’s assignment

3-5 years of work experience in a relevant discipline

Good analytical and problem solving skills
Good project management skill
Ability to work under pressure and time constraint
Experience in data analytical and used analytical program such as Power BI, Macro Excel, Python is a plus
Good oral and written communication skills in both Thai and English

jobs.title: Kubix – Digital Asset Tokenization: Head of Sales & Deal Structuring
jobs.description: In this role, you will join Kubix on their mission as ICO portal to offer financial advisory and technology platform for issuers to tokenize their fund raising projects on Blockchain technology, and at the same time provide investors with new investment platform for digital assets.
responsibility: Manage client relationship and deal pipeline with potential issuers
Manage a team of deal structurers and executors to ensure the ICO launch process meets the SEC regulatory filing timeline
Be the SEC gatekeeper: discuss potential deal structure and overall process of ICO deal filing
Manage the process of marketing and pitching to potential issuers to promote new trend of asset tokenization and Initial Coin Offerings (ICO) process as alternative fund raising channel

Oversee due diligence process on a potential issuer who is interested in going through Initial Coin Offerings, i.e. company analysis, financial analysis, and regulatory feasibility test to ensure issuer’s eligibility as per SEC regulation

Oversee deal structuring, conduct financial analysis of the project/asset that the issuer proposes as token’s underlying, including conducting market and business trend to project potential growth and expected return of the project/asset
Structure legal vehicle of the token (such as trust or SPV), including discussing with legal advisor, tax advisor, and accounting advisor to due diligence all key considerations
Ensure that an issuer provide required information and financial data for disclosure and coordinate with legal advisor to prepare SEC filing for ICO and meet regulatory requirement
qualification: 5-10 years of experience in investment banking, IPO transactions, Financial Advisory, Corporate Financing or related financial/structuring fields, fluent with dealing and understanding SEC regulation
Self-starter and visionary person with strong leadership and self-motivation capabilities to manage a team, while being hands-on in deal structuring details
Excitement to explore new technology and build new financial ecosystem, understanding the basic of Blockchain, smart contract, ICO and asset tokenization
Ability to take full ownership of the process, self-motivation, and multi-tasking
Startup founder mindset, eagerness to work in a small but dynamic team, and ability to thrive in a dynamic environment, maintaining composure and a positive attitude
Excellent written and verbal interpersonal skills, with an ability to communicate with a wide range of team members and job functions – all the way up to executives
A degree in Finance, Economics or related fields
skill: Financial Advisory, Investment Banking, IPO Transactions, ICO Portal

A degree in Finance, Economics or related fields
